hero.subtitle: Tailored Visa Programs for Your Success
hero.description: Visa programs designed to suit your needs and fulfill your ambitions. At Kaya, we accompany you step-by-step to ensure you reach your destination with confidence and peace of mind.

programs.name: Canada Visa
features: Diligent follow-up of your file from start to visa receipt
Full support in preparing documents and purpose of travel letter
Expert guidance through Canadian immigration process

programs.name: USA Visa
programs.tagline: Your Journey to the American Dream
features: Specialized consultations for embassy interview
Professional completion of electronic forms (DS-160)
Comprehensive preparation for visa application

programs.name: UK Visa
features: Preparation of comprehensive file with supporting bookings
Quick follow-up for biometric and interview appointments
Expert assistance with UK visa requirements

programs.name: Germany Visa (Schengen)
features: Multiple-entry visa to visit several European countries
Full support in booking appointments and submitting application
Complete Schengen visa assistance

why_programs.title: Why Choose Our Programs?
why_programs.subtitle: Every program at Kaya is not just a service, but a journey that starts from the moment your file is prepared until you arrive at your destination.

benefits.title: Comprehensive Support
benefits.description: From initial consultation to visa receipt, we're with you every step of the way

benefits.title: Expert Guidance
benefits.description: Our experienced team knows the ins and outs of each visa process

benefits.title: Document Preparation
benefits.description: Professional assistance in preparing all required documents and forms

benefits.title: High Success Rate
benefits.description: Proven track record with thousands of successful visa applications

steps.title: Choose Your Program
steps.description: Select the visa program that matches your destination and goals

steps.title: Initial Consultation
steps.description: Meet with our experts to discuss your specific needs and requirements

steps.title: Document Preparation
steps.description: We help you gather and prepare all necessary documents

steps.title: Application Submission
steps.description: Professional submission of your visa application with complete follow-up

steps.title: Interview Preparation
steps.description: Expert coaching for embassy interviews and biometric appointments

steps.title: Visa Receipt
steps.description: Celebrate your success as you receive your visa and prepare to travel

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Journey?
cta.description: Choose your program today and let us guide you to your destination
